html:
Pronunciation[edit]

  • (Classical) IPA(key): /juːˈkun.doː/, [juːˈkʊn̪.d̪oː]
  • (Ecclesiastical) IPA(key): /juˈkun.do/, [juˈkun̪.d̪ɔ]

Verb[edit]

jūcundō (present infinitive jūcundāre, perfect active jūcundāvī, supine jūcundātum); first conjugation

  1. Alternative form of iūcundō

Conjugation[edit]

Adjective[edit]

jūcundō

  1. dative masculine singular of jūcundus
  2. dative neuter singular of jūcundus
  3. ablative masculine singular of jūcundus
  4. ablative neuter singular of jūcundus

References[edit]

  • jucundo in Charlton T. Lewis and Charles Short (1879) A Latin Dictionary, Oxford: Clarendon Press
  • jucundo in Gaffiot, Félix (1934) Dictionnaire Illustré Latin-Français, Hachette
